paragraph.heading: 1Eiffel, The Language
paragraph.paragraph: These pages contain documentation describing the Eiffel programming language.
Two introductory pages are included which give a brief overview of the Eiffel language, and reasons for its use:

link.label: Why Your Next Project Should Use Eiffel

paragraph.paragraph:
If you are new to the language, then it is recommended that you read
/general/guided_tour/language/invitation-00.xml An Invitation to Eiffel which details classic Eiffel, but is a great introduction to Eiffel technology.
/general/guided_tour/language/tutorial-00.xml An Eiffel Tutorial is also provided which talks you through the processes involved in developing an Eiffel system.

An extensive collection of pages detailing the
/20_Language/10_Eiffel_NET/10_Eiffel_for_NET.xml Eiffel for .Net Language are available
/20_Language/10_Eiffel_NET/10_Eiffel_for_NET.xml here .
See Also
/10_Developing/index.xml Developing With ENViSioN!
